name: Priest's Path
description:
Priest's Path is an RPG where you must defeat the Guardians in order to be crowned Head Priest. However, your god demands constant offerings of stat points, and each Guardian is stronger than the last. Will you be able to last against the ever-increasing challenge?

Priest's Path was made in 48 hours by one person for Ludum Dare 43. The theme was "Sacrifices must be made". The game can be beaten in 5 minutes or less if you're lucky or good enough.
